title: The location within the land of all proposed and existing roads with their existing / proposed width
clause_text: The location within the land of all proposed and existing roads with their existing / proposed widths and all the proposals of the Development Plan / Town Planning Scheme, if any;

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The location within the land of all proposed and existing roads with their existing / proposed widths and all the proposals of the Development Plan / Town Planning Scheme, if any;
